description:
After defeating the Blackghost Knight, Kelvin now has powerful servants at his command. But he needs another party member, and he has his eyes set on a certain half-elf slave...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Secret Shared with the Guild, and a Slave Girl
Accord secret avec le maître de guilde et achat d’une jeune esclave
Guild to no Mitsuyaku to Dorei Shoujo
ギルドとの密約と奴隷少女
